About me

 

My name is Rafael de Castro. I live and develop software in Madrid, Spain although I was born in Gij√≥n. This is my little page where I drop some content from time to time. Mostly about software development but who knows. This is a personal page anyhow.

I'm also the proud father of a little kid. She helps me a lot and with 1 year she writes better code than I do. Well maybe not... but she's really cute.

 
 

You will often find me at Mendicant University participating in whichever event we may organize. The MU is a group of programmers that want to learn together and leave a positive impact on the world. If you don't know a lot about MU you should check its newcomers guide and the community guidelines to understand a little bit what it is.

 

I've been a coder since I can remember. Starting with an Amstrad CPC 6128 that my parents bought me coding small Basic programs until now... Software development is my passion and I try to do it just a little bit better each day. You can find some chops I made at Github. There is nothing too fancy there but, you know, it's my little space.
